1.title: Lisa
1.plot: By November 1984, 17-year-old Lisa has endured a lifetime of abuse. But the horrifying events of one night change her life forever. As she heads home after a late night shift from the only safe haven she knows--a part-time job at a local donut shop--Lisa is abducted by a terrifying man. Meanwhile, Tampa detectives are tracking a prolific serial killer terrorizing the city.

2.title: Jennifer
2.plot: In 1992, 18-year-old Jennifer is excited to be working with handicapped children in Palm Springs, California. Then, one morning after work, Jennifer's world takes a dark turn when she accepts a ride home from a stranger. Over the next few hours, Jennifer faces an evil like no other, all the while knowing that she is not the stranger's only victim.

3.title: Kara
3.plot: In 2002, In Columbia, South Carolina, 15-year-old Kara's quiet summer break comes to an abrupt end when a serial killer snatches her from her best friend's front yard. While Kara fights to survive, investigators in a small Virginia community scramble to find leads in the murders of three adolescents.

imdb.plot outline: I Escaped My Killer follows the true stories of would-be murder victims who escaped a serial killer's grasp...not only with their lives but also with the information needed to break the case. While a single serial killer can murder dozens and strike fear into the hearts of thousands, it only takes one person to bring a monster's reign of terror to an end.
imdb.title: I Escaped My Killer
plot: _I Escaped My Killer_ (qv) follows the true stories of would-be murder victims who escaped a serial killer's grasp...not only with their lives but also with the information needed to break the case. While a single serial killer can murder dozens and strike fear into the hearts of thousands, it only takes one person to bring a monster's reign of terror to an end.
